CustomField.description: Case 2041 - Create a Weighted Funding Required and Notional Value (SB Underwrite) fields on the Lending / Deposits / Commitments Product Page, Name change to Notional fields: SGPRT-1229
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The weighted amount that SB will be providing the client in relation to the specific facility (SB Gross Participation x Opportunity Probability %)
CustomField.label: Weighted SB Gross Participation
